summary: A group of strangers visit an ancient Hungarian castle and bring along a werewolf.
cast: Phil Davis|Victoria Catlin|Elizabeth Shé|Ben Cole|William Shockley|Mark Sivertsen|Stephanie Faulkner|Mary Stavin|Clive Turner|Nigel Triffitt|Jill Pearson|József Madaras|Renáta Szatler
title: Aullidos 5: El regreso
